forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers this morning with overcast skies during the afternoon hours. High 13C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with some evening fog. Low 9C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Fog early, then cloudy late. Low 48F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 13C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 56F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening becoming more intermittent overnight. Low 49F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Morning clouds will give way to sunshine for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, becoming mostly sunny in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low around 5C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 41F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 6C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 44F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 18C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High around 65F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with showers at times. High 16C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High near 60F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 47F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 47F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 9C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 48F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 12C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 6C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 43F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 51F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 6C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 43F. NNW winds shifting to SE at 10 to 15 mph.
